tool_description: Extract the embedded text from any PDF
name: PDF To Text
title: PDF To Text

api_list.name: Text extraction
api_list.description: Extracts text from PDF -  POST PDF as base64 encoded JSON parameter "data" - Max PDF size is a little over 7MiB (10MiB maximum request size)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-to-text.p.rapidapi.com/text-extraction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-to-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-to-text.p.rapidapi.com/text-extraction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-to-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
